1.0.0.name: wordpress/simple-seo-categories-posts
1.0.0.description:
Simple SEO Categories Posts is a plugin/widget, for displaying on your site the posts from specified categories.

Widget options

  • Title
  • Categories IDs
  • Number of posts
  • Display Title
  • Display Thumb
  • Thumb Width
  • Thumb Height
  • Thumb Crop
  • Display Excerpt
  • Excerpt Length
  • Display Date
  • Display Author
  • Before Author
  • Order By
  • Normal/Reverse
  • Title Order
  • Thumb Order
  • Excerpt Order
  • Date Order
  • Author Order

Detailed description and guide
